name: SCHOLARLY PUBLISHING AND ACADEMIC RESOURCES COALITION
sampleDescriptions: Encourage inclusion of open educational resources as a permissible use of Perkins Career and Technical Education Act funding.  Advocate for open textbook program in the Higher Education Act.
